homeHero.subtext: Join our community designed specifically for Vietnamese students and professionals seeking to advance their careers in the United States. Get personalized guidance from industry experts and build your professional network.

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.repBody: Our community includes over 500 members from diverse backgrounds across various industries and organizations, and we make sure that everybody is welcomed.
achievements.mentorBody: Our platform is powered by a diverse network of 100+ experienced professionals across the United States, bringing expertise from various industries and backgrounds.
achievements.industryBody: With over 15+ years of combined industry experience, our mentors provide deep insights and practical guidance based on real-world expertise.

JobAppTip.title: Job Application Tips
JobAppTip.subtitle: Real journeys, real results. See how CF Hub members landed their dream jobs and overcame career challenges.

CareerStories.title: Career Stories
CareerStories.subtitle: Real journeys, real results. See how CF Hub members landed their dream jobs and overcame career challenges.

trending.title: TRENDING
trending.subtitle: Discover the most popular articles and insights from our community

jobApp.title: Career Path Visualizer
jobApp.subtitle: Explore different career paths and discover your potential. See real success stories and find your perfect career trajectory.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
cta.description: Join our community and get personalized guidance for your chosen career path.

finance.title: Finance & Banking
finance.description: Investment banking, corporate finance, risk management

roadmap.description: Accounting basics, time value of money, Excel fundamentals and corporate finance principles.
Build DCF, LBO and merger models in Excel; learn sensitivity and scenario analysis.
Use SQL/Python for data analysis; become proficient with Bloomberg/Refinitiv terminals.
Work on M&A, capital markets, due diligence and prepare client-facing materials.
Pursue CFA/FRM or MBA depending on track; specialize in sectors like PE, asset management or corporate finance.
Lead deal teams, manage client relationships and take ownership of financial strategy.
Shape firm strategy, mentor senior staff and drive business development initiatives.
Develop structured problem solving, quantitative reasoning and case interview basics.
Master Excel modeling, basic SQL and data visualization for client deliverables.
Participate in workstreams: market sizing, process mapping, KPI definition and stakeholder workshops.
Choose industry or function focus (strategy, operations, digital) and deepen domain knowledge.
Lead project modules, manage junior consultants and deliver executive presentations.
Grow professional network, consider MBA or advanced credentials for acceleration.
Drive client portfolio, win new business and build firm-level capabilities.

tech.title: Software Engineering Roles
tech.description: Software engineering, Product management, Data science

roadmap.description: Learn programming fundamentals; focus on one language, data structures, algorithms and Git basics.
Master HTML/CSS/JS and frameworks like React or Next.js; build interactive UIs.
Build REST/GraphQL APIs, work with SQL/NoSQL databases and implement auth patterns.
Ship end-to-end apps, deploy to platforms (Vercel, Render) and add tests and CI workflows.
Learn Docker, CI/CD (GitHub Actions), cloud fundamentals on AWS/GCP/Azure and monitoring.
Master system design, microservices, caching strategies and performance optimization.
Lead architecture, mentor teams and influence product and engineering strategy.

marketing.title: Marketing & Growth
marketing.description: Digital marketing, brand management, growth hacking

roadmap.description: Understand marketing fundamentals: customer funnels, positioning, segmentation and basic analytics.
Learn SEO fundamentals, Google Analytics, tag management and basic HTML for marketers.
Run paid acquisition (Google Ads, Meta), set up tracking and optimize cost-per-acquisition.
Design A/B tests, improve conversion rates and build retention loops using product analytics.
Develop content strategy, social media playbooks and long-term brand positioning.
Use SQL, BI tools and attribution modeling to guide channel investment decisions.
Lead growth teams, define GTM strategy and align marketing with product and sales goals.

footer.aboutBody1: VNPN is a network connecting Vietnamese professionals in the United States. Our mission is to create career opportunities for all members through access to recruiting insights, domain knowledge, and mentorship from experienced professionals.
footer.aboutBody2: VNPN is a non-profit initiative supported by the Vietnamese Youth and Students Association in the USA (sinhvienusa.org) and the VietChallenge competition (vietchallenge.org). The project is currently in Beta.
footer.copyright: Â© 2025 CF Hub Corporation - Official website of CF Hub Corporation.

words.toSecureJobs: to secure jobs and build successful careers in

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.intro: VNPN is a network connecting Vietnamese professionals in the United States. VNPN's mission is to create career development opportunities for all members by providing access to recruitment information, specialized knowledge, and mentorship from experienced professionals. VNPN hopes to contribute to building a cohesive and mutually supportive Vietnamese community abroad.

reasons.contribute: You want to contribute and help build the Vietnamese community in the United States
reasons.share: You want your experience to be shared and utilized
reasons.recruit: You want to find new members for your company
reasons.cofounder: You want to find a co-founder for your startup
reasons.referral: You want the opportunity to get an internal job referral
reasons.resume: You want your resume reviewed by experienced professionals in the same field
reasons.mentor: You want to find an experienced mentor for career development
reasons.insights: You want to learn about companies you're interested in from the perspective of Vietnamese people working there
reasons.connect: You want to connect with other members working across the United States

aboutUs.nonprofit: VNPN is a non-profit project, implemented with support from the Association of Vietnamese Youth and Students in the United States (
aboutUs.betaNote: ). The project is currently being tested in the Beta phase.

quang.name: Quang Nguyen
description: Quang Nguyen is currently a Software Engineer at Microsoft. He previously interned as a software engineer at NVIDIA (Summer 2023) and Facebook (Summer 2022).
He received a full-ride scholarship worth $73,000/year for 4 years at Rice University, majoring in Computer Science.
As the President of Rice Apps (Rice Software Engineering Club) at Rice University, he has mentored and taught over 60 members about professional web and mobile application development.

tri.name: Tri Bui
description: Tri Bui currently works in Risk Management at Revantage, a Blackstone portfolio company, and has interned as a Software Engineer at Daikin, DetectAuto, and Deloitte Vietnam.
Founder/CEO of Esmart Solutions, a company providing communication and technology solutions to small and medium-sized businesses in Vietnam.
President of the Entrepreneurship and Investment Clubs at Macalester College. He has won multiple awards in technology, finance, and entrepreneurship, with a total value exceeding $15,000.

anh.name: Anh Ngo
description: Anh Ngo is currently an Investment Banking Analyst at Deutsche Bank.
She received a scholarship to study Economics at the University of Pennsylvania (UPenn).
Vice President of the Wharton Finance Club and a member of the International Student Advisory Board at UPenn.
She has extensive experience working at UPenn Career Services, where she has assisted over 200 students with resume reviews and career guidance.
